name: Greater sciatic foramen
text: Structures exiting the greater sciatic foramen: piriformis; superior gluteal nerve and vessels; inferior gluteal nerve and vessels; sciatic nerve; pudendal nerve; internal pudendal vessels; posterior femoral cutaneous nerve; nerve to obturator internus; nerve to quadratus femoris. Pudendal nerve, internal pudendal vessels, and nerve to obturator internus exit the greater sciatic foramen and re-enter via the lesser sciatic foramen.

name: Lesser sciatic foramen
text: Structures exiting the lesser sciatic foramen: obturator internus; pudendal nerve; nerve to obturator internus; internal pudendal vessels. Pudendal nerve, internal pudendal vessels, and nerve to obturator internus exit the greater sciatic foramen and re-enter via the lesser sciatic foramen.
